report.title: Record counts by month for species
report.description: Phenology - lists months and the number of records for each for a given species selected by preferred name external key or taxon meaning ID.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences_functional o #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND o.zero_abundance='f' AND ('#external_key#'='' OR o.taxa_taxon_list_external_key='#external_key#') AND ('#taxon_meaning_id#'='' OR cast(o.taxon_meaning_id AS character varying)='#taxon_meaning_id#') AND (CAST(o.survey_id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='') AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR o.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR o.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date)) AND quality_check('#quality#', o.record_status, o.certainty)=true AND o.date_type <> 'U' AND o.date_type not like '%-%'

param.name: external_key
param.description: External key of the preferred taxon name, e.g. the NBN Tvk for UK species lists

param.name: taxon_meaning_id
param.description: Alternative way of filtering - by taxon meaning ID, as displayed on the taxon edit page in the warehouse.

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for, or leave for all surveys
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys

param.name: quality
param.description: Quality level required of data to be included in the map.
param.lookup_values: V:Data must be verified,C:Data must be verified or certain,L:Data must be at least likely,!D:Include anything not dubious or rejected,!R:Include anything not rejected
